title: 05/03/2021 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 05/03/2021 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP and the guys return from the weekend to talk about the latest on the Aaron Rodgers drama as well as recap the NFL Draft. Peter King joined the show and discussed why he doesn't think Aaron Rodgers will be a Packer on Week. Wisconsin area radio host, Mike Heller says that the situation was personal for Rodgers while it was a business decision for the Packers. Lastly, Reggie Miller makes his long awaited return to the show to preview the league as the regular season begins to wind down.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

On today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP and the guys return from the weekend to talk about the latest on the Aaron Rodgers drama as well as recap the NFL Draft. Peter King joined the show and discussed why he doesn't think Aaron Rodgers will be a Packer on Week. Wisconsin area radio host, Mike Heller says that the situation was personal for Rodgers while it was a business decision for the Packers. Lastly, Reggie Miller makes his long awaited return to the show to preview the league as the regular season begins to wind down.
